title: Timeout
desc: Set the number of minutes after which application deactivates.

title: Password Timeout
desc: Set the number of seconds after which the secret info are deleted from the device memory clipboard.

title: Login auto-completion
desc: Enable the autocompletion: the system fills user and password filelds by double clicking on the user fileld. If disabled user and password are simply copied to the clipboard, ready for paste.

title: Automatic
desc: Set the default password type: generated or user defined.

title: Password lifetime
desc: Set the password life time in months.

title: Expire warning
desc: Set the number of days to be warned about password expiration.
